txt.en: The scourge of the goblins appears to be everywhere these days, even on the borders of the Shire itself. Rumour has it that in Evendim a new breed of the foul creatures can be found in the odd-looking Boggarts -- cowardly snivelling things that hunt in packs to bring down their prey.

There is little pride to be had in the defeat of goblins -- they are hardly suitable opponents -- yet many a brave warrior has been overwhelmed by their numbers or cunning devices of war, so it is best not to underestimate them.
